author: Timothy Puko
title: Robert Murray Says His Coal Company Will Survive Without Trump Administration’s Help
text:
Coal magnate Robert Murray, after warning his company could be pushed into bankruptcy if the Midwest coal industry failed to get a bailout from federal regulators, said he now expects his company to thrive whether or not the Trump administration intervenes.
Mr. Murray, chief executive and controlling owner of Murray Energy Corp. and a major Trump supporter, said in an interview that surging demand for coal in Asia, along with his company’s growing exports to that region, have revived his business. Growing Chinese imports,...
